body.name: Royal Therapy Queen Memory Foam Pillow - Pharmonis USA Bamboo Adjustable Orthopedic Contour Pillow for Back, Stomach and Side Sleepers - Neck and Shoulder Support

climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: 60% Polyester and 40% Rayon Made from Bamboo

Behind every great night’s sleep is our cervical neck pillow with an ideal shape, height, and density. This contour neck pillow provides just that, offering you a perfect balance of orthopedic support and plushness.

Royal Therapy side and back sleeper pillows don't only provide support and comfort, but they also make your night's sleep something you look forward to. We took a new approach to create our ergonomic pillow. Unlike traditional contour pillow for side sleepers, our special foam is engineered to make a more ventilated, adjustable cervical pillow.

Our memory foam cervical pillow is designed to relieve neck and shoulder pain by providing the correct sleeping posture. Made to cradle your natural curve, our neck contour pillow comes with an adjustable loft that accommodates different shoulder widths.

The unique 3-layer design allows you to adjust the memory foam contour pillow for optimal orthopedic support so you can sleep comfortably all night. Simply remove the middle layer of memory foam to customize your comfort level. Your body will be molded to the back and side sleeper cervical pillow for a complete ergonomic sleep.

Made from a CertiPUR US memory foam pillow for neck pain works with your body’s temperature to provide the highest quality sleep. Thick enough for personal comfort zones, yet slim enough to encourage sound sleep and spinal alignment throughout the night.
Our premium back and neck pillow memory foam is covered with an original luxurious soft OEKO-TEX washable rayon made from bamboo cover to wick away moisture, keeping you comfortable all night long.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Turn Ordinary Sleep Into a Royal Experience Ask anyone who has slept on a great pillow if they’d do it differently if they had their life to live over again. Literally, it’s the difference between waking up sore and waking up refreshed. Feel Like an Olympian Again with Royal Therapy Finally, sleep that helps you perform like an Olympian. Royal Therapy is the only product on the market engineered to help your body recharge like new after rigorous physical activity. Boost Productivity & Relieve Tension If you want to be more productive, it’s time to schedule a nap. We create the best orthopedic pillow for increased brain activity, relieving tension, stress & mental exhaustion. Discover a Whole New Level of Comfort The coziness of your bed seems never-ending. Every time you wake up, the Royal Therapy pillow gives you a gentle hug and reminds you that life is not so bad out there.

For Back Sleepers Sleeping on your back allows your spine to remain in proper alignment, helping to prevent back pain and spinal damage. For Side Sleepers Side sleepers can get comfortable relief while alleviating pressure that causes headaches, neck pain and numbness. For Stomach Sleepers For those who love to sleep on their bellies, our pillow provides relief from pressure points and aligns the spine. Your Superb Neck Pillow With a firm yet soft design, our pillow can help keep your neck aligned while you sleep and provide a more comfortable rest.

Royal Therapy King Memory Foam Pillow Royal Therapy 4-Layer Queen Memory Foam Pillow Royal Therapy 4-Layer King Memory Foam Pillow Royal Therapy Shredded Memory Foam Pillow Royal Therapy Professional Hotel Pillows Dimensions 31 x 14 x 5.1" 24 x 14 x 6.5" 31 x 14 x 6.5" 20 x 30" 20 x 26" Layers 3 4 4 n/a n/a Firmness Medium Medium Medium Medium Medium Size King Queen King Queen & King Standard, Queen & King 2-Pack available ✓ ✓ Filling Memory Foam Memory Foam Memory Foam Memory Foam Gel Microfiber Adjustable Height & Firmness ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This pillow is exactly what I needed for my neck issues. I was waking up with severe neck pain. Someone had recommended this pillow and I can’t thank them enough. It is soft yet very supportive. You can choose the large side or smaller side. I HIGHLY recommend it. Excellent quality!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars What a difference!
reviews.reviewText: What a difference this pillow makes . Comfy right away . Fall asleep fast quickly. No more stiff neck.Well worth the price ! But it !!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I really dont leave any reviews but I thought this might help others out there struggling just like me in finding a good pillow for your neck.I was amazed how this pillow has been helping my neck and for sleeping as well. I've bought so many pillow trying to find one that really works. I researched and saw this one on Amazon. I gave it a try. Wow!! Its been helping me to sleep and the pillow is so soft that I really love it. Great pillow.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love this pillow! So soft and comfortable yet provides the neck support I was looking for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Quality and Performance
reviews.reviewText: Most important info first, using this pillow for the past few weeks has eliminated my soar neck and back I was waking up with. I am using the pillow in the side sleeping position with the thicker contour under my neck. I can tell I don’t toss/ turn as much because my hair isn’t messed up when I wake up.The zipper cover looks and feels like good quality. The memory foam feels premium. It has a good density and rebound characteristic unlike cheap memory foam. It does a have foam smell to it that isn’t pleasant, but it is minimal in comparison to other foam products. On a scale of 1-10 of foam off gassing odor it’s a 3. It doesn’t bother me when I’m sleeping and the cotton pillow case I put over it traps in the smell. I don’t think it’s currently possible to have foam that has zero off gas smell and the toxin exposure is worth the physical benefit to me at this time. Royal Therapy is using a very good quality foam and I would recommend this pillow. Thank you = )

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I broke my neck at C2 and have a 4 level fusion. (Stiff neck and frequent headaches after sleeping.) Comfort during rest is imperative. This pillow is not a magical fix. Only moderate in comfort. I'm using it since I bought it, but I'm still searching for the right pillow for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I found this pillow after searching everywhere for something to fit my needs. I bought it because of the shape and the price was mid ranged from everything I had been researching. I’m a side sleeper, wide shoulders, frequently waking up with a stiff, sore neck. This pillow gave my neck and shoulder proper support and no pain for a full 2 years before I started to wake up with neck pain again. Any decent memory foam will last you 2-3 years anyways and this one did exactly that! I’m about to purchase again! Definitely give it a try.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very quality pillow
reviews.reviewText: Reviewing this after almost a year and a half of nightly use. Pillow is still in great shape, no flattening out in any areas or decrease in comfort or intended function and it appears like it will keep going that way for quite awhile. While I mostly use the lower contour of the pillow if my neck is bothering me more than usual I go to the higher side for a night or two and every thing works out great.It's nice the cover can be taken off to be washed. My only knock on this product would be it can be a bit of work to get the foam insert back into the cover.

Es incómodo la almohada para mi cuello o está muy alta o está muy baja, porque la almohada tiene 3 niveles le puedes quitar el nivel del medio ó dejarle los 3 entonces ni uno ni otro lo sentí incómodo y el material de foamy se empezó a romper, a mucha personas les favoreció que bueno solo que yo no corrí con la misma suerte… :(
Pillow comes with right size for AdultsProsTwo sides with varied thicknessComes with memory foamTop cover is breathableFeels premium
The pillow arrived on time but it was not as I expected it and I returned it
